LanguageData.Apparel_SimpleNightVision.label: night vision monocular
LanguageData.Apparel_SimpleNightVision.description: A simple, monocular night vision device, worn strapped to the head.
LanguageData.Apparel_AdvancedNightVision.label: advanced night vision goggles
LanguageData.Apparel_AdvancedNightVision.description: An set of advanced night vision goggles offering detailed, panoramic vision when fighting in the dark.
